item.title: The Papers: End of 'golden ticket' asylum rules and Labour leadership talk
item.description: The home secretary's overhaul of immigration rules and rumours about challenges to the prime minister feature in Sunday's papers.

item.title: Thirteen injured after demolition derby car hits crowd in Australia
item.description: The car was taking part in the race in New South Wales when it drove through a fence and hit the grandstand, police said.

item.title: Refugees to face 20-year wait to settle permanently under asylum reforms
item.description: Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood is expected to announce major reforms to the asylum system on Monday.

item.title: Storm Claudia: Disruption after flooding causes major incident
item.description: The fire and rescue service was called to more than 82 incidents after severe flooding in South Wales.

item.title: Thousands protest against government in Mexico as clashes leave 120 injured
item.description: The protests came weeks after Carlos Manzo, mayor of Uruapan, was killed.
